parameters:
\N<Luda Soldier>Beyond here is Lord Zuuteruka's office. He's also the
commander of this garrison... Make sure to watch your words
and actions carefully.

\C[1]■Request Details: Other■Requester: The Sojourning
Painter\C[0]Assistance with creative works, report to the
requester staying on the second floor of the tavern.

\C[1]■Request Details: Other■Requester: The Sojourning
Painter\C[0]Assistance with creative work, report to the
requester staying on the second floor of the tavern.

\C[1]■Request Details: Business Assistance■Requester: Tavern
Master\C[0]Simple business assistance in the operation of
the tavern.

\C[1]■Request Details: Business Assistance■Requester: Tavern
Master\C[0]Simple business assistance in the operation of
the tavern.
\N<Luda Soldier>What's this? What business do you have beyond here?

\N<Segi>...I've come to get permission for an audience with Lord
Yuia. Let me see Zuuteruka.
\N<Luda Soldier>Lord Zuuteruka, is that alright with you?
\N<Zuuteruka>Huh? I'm a bit tied up right now. What do you want?
\N<Luda Soldier>...The woman in question has arrived. What should we do?
\N<Zuuteruka>Hmph, Segi, huh? Fine, let her through. But make it quick.

\N<Zuuteruka>Yo, Segi. You were here? Sorry, I was so busy I didn't
notice.

\N<Zuuteruka>Just as you see. Don't tell me you don't understand? You're
not exactly the picture of innocence and purity, hehehe.
\N<Segi>Gah...! That's not what I'm talking about!

\N<Zuuteruka>What's that? Why are you raising your eyebrows at me? Did
you come here to lecture me?

\N<Zuuteruka>Or is it something else? Do you want to be screwed too? If
that's the case, wait your turn, there's a queue.

\N<Zuuteruka>You can do that much, right? Even that boy over there is
quietly waiting for his mother to finish being fucked,
hehehe.

\N<Segi>What are you saying...!? This child is just scared and
anxious...!

\N<Zuuteruka>No way, that's not it, right boy? You don't care that your
mother is being fucked right in front of you, right? You're
just quietly waiting for it to end, aren't you?

\N<Zuuteruka>Though I must say... hehehe, indeed it might be boring just
watching your mother getting screwed and enjoying it.

\N<Zuuteruka>Didn't you hear me? I said strip. Show the boy a grown
woman's naked body to relieve his boredom. Hehehe, I must
say, it's a good idea, isn't it?

\N<Zuuteruka>It'll be irresistible for a boy his age, a perfect
distraction.

\N<Zuuteruka>I'm not joking. What are you spacing out for? Didn't you
hear me? I'll say it again—I told you to strip.

\N<Zuuteruka>Hey, what are you doing? Don't cover up like that. Show
everything.
\N<Segi>How could I possibly do such a thing...!

\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe, what a cruel woman. Don't you feel sorry for this
boy?

\N<Zuuteruka>His mother is being fucked and broken right before his
eyes... And yet he's desperately holding back his tears.
Don't you find that pitiful?

\N<Zuuteruka>Hmph, don't mess with me... Which mouth of yours is spouting
such nonsense...!

\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe, if you pity the boy, then show him. Maybe this sight
will become a somewhat pleasant memory for him?

\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe... Just so you know, this isn't a suggestion. It's an
order. Don't upset me, alright? You understand, don't you?

\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe, nice. So, boy, how is it seeing a woman's body for
the first time?

\N<Zuuteruka>Take a good look, okay? All women love being watched. It
seems to excite them even more, you know? Of course, that
includes your mother too, hehehe.

\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe, lucky you, Segi. The boy is completely fixated on
your body. That should hold back his tears a bit.

\N<Zuuteruka>Plus, you must be thrilled to have such a young male so
excited by you, right? Eh?

\N<Segi>Don't mess with me! Release that child and his mother right
now!

\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe, I refuse. If you want, I could even involve you and
that boy right here and now.
\N<Segi>Such insolence...! Even as a joke... I won't forgive you...!

\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe, who said anything about a joke? Well, if I were
serious, you'd already be entertaining that boy over there,
wouldn't you?

\N<Luda Soldier>Here we have a request board set up by the residents and our
Luda soldiers.

\N<Luda Soldier>You cannot undertake multiple requests at the same time.
Also, you cannot accept other requests until you complete
the one you've undertaken and the date changes.

\C[1]■Request Details: Continued. Combat Training■Requester:
Rozaro\C[0]Combat training for the Militia Assembly. Looking
for a sparring partner for mock battles.

\C[1]■Request Details: Continued. Combat Training■Requester:
Rozaro\C[0]Combat training for the Militia Assembly. Looking
for a sparring partner, assuming a person-to-person training
scenario.
